description: Many products can call themselves organic but that does not mean that they are 100% organic. In fact, very few products are 100% as they usually contain water and often non-organic ingredients such as synthetic fragrance, which is a common skin and respiratory irritant. At Thistle Fields all our products are certified by UK certifying body The Soil Association.
A naturally aggressive anti-bacterial spray to tackle kitchen grease and germs

A fresh and cleanly scented polish for baths, sinks and toilets.
